DataElement.preferredName: Environmental Protection Agency Environmental Justice Screening and Mapping Tool Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The EPA is the US Government's watchdog agency responsible for controlling the pollution of air and water, pesticides, radiation hazards and noise pollution. The agency is also involved in research to examine the effects of pollution. (EPA Terminology Reference System)_A tool that allows users to access environmental and demographic information for locations in the United States at the census block level._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
